title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 May 2015 - XWiki
content:

09:34 <gdelhumeau> Hi  
09:34 <gdelhumeau> I'm going to fix xwiki-platfor  
09:34 <gdelhumeau> +m  
09:36 <vmassol> ok good morning  
09:39 <vmassol> today is release day :)  
09:56 <evalica> has joined #xwiki

10:12 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki

10:44 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:02 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
11:15 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:31 <vmassol> tmortagne: shouldn't we put this info in the admin guide, under monitoring or http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Performances , since it's avail at runtime?  
11:33 <tmortagne> vmassol: I don't know, pretty much everything in http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Debugging is about runtime too, in here it's more about short time of specific task debugging that monitoring (that feel more like statistics and general metrics)  
11:34 <tmortagne> as for http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Performances yes I planned to link it there  
11:34 <vmassol> if we don't want admins to know about it then it's the right place  
11:34 <vmassol> otherwise it's not  
11:34 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Logging is here also  
11:35 <vmassol> anyway… I'll let you decide :) we can change later  
11:35 <tmortagne> logging is not the same thing  
11:36 <vmassol> btw shouldn't we support just passing ?debug  
11:36 <vmassol> ?  
11:36 <vmassol> (ie no value)  
11:37 <tmortagne> don't know  
11:37 <vmassol> it's minor...  
11:41 <tmortagne> vmassol: don't have anything against it, I just did the same than http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Solr+Search+Application#HSearchDebug for consistency  
11:42 <vmassol> ok  
11:42 <tmortagne> did not tough much about it, was more interested by the result :)  
11:42 <vmassol> yep :)
